trans-unit.source: Represents the navigation and manipulation user interface (UI) for controls on a form that are bound to data.
trans-unit.target: 表示巡覽及管理使用者介面 (UI) 控制項在表單上繫結至資料。

trans-unit.source: The BindingNavigator control represents a standardized way to navigate and manipulate data on a form.
trans-unit.target: BindingNavigator 控制項代表標準化的方式，來巡覽和管理在表單上的資料。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, a BindingNavigator is paired with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> control to move through data records on a form and interact with them.
trans-unit.target: 在大部分情況下，配對 BindingNavigator<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>控制項在表單上移動資料記錄，並且與其互動。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: In these cases, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> property is set to the associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource?displayProperty=fullName> component that acts as a data source.
trans-unit.target: 在這些情況下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>屬性設定至相關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource?displayProperty=fullName>做為資料來源的元件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the BindingNavigator control's user interface (UI) is composed of a series of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> buttons, text boxes, and static text elements for most common data-related actions, such as adding data, deleting data, and navigating through data.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，BindingNavigator 控制項的使用者介面 (UI) 組成的一系列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>按鈕、 文字方塊和最常見資料相關的動作，例如將資料加入、 刪除資料，並瀏覽資料的靜態文字項目。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Each of these controls can be retrieved or set through an associated member of the BindingNavigator control.
trans-unit.target: 這些控制項可以擷取或設定透過 BindingNavigator 控制項的相關聯之成員。

trans-unit.source: Likewise, there is also a one-to-one correspondence to members within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> class that programmatically perform the same functionality, as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，另外還有成員內的一對一對應<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>以程式設計方式執行相同的功能下, 表所示的類別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: |UI Control|BindingNavigator member|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> member| |----------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |**Move First**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveFirstItem%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveFirst%2A>| |**Move Previous**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MovePreviousItem%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MovePrevious%2A>| |**Current Position**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A>| |**Count**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>| |**Move Next**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveNextItem%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveNext%2A>| |**Move Last**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveLastItem%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveLast%2A>| |**Add New**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddNewItem%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A>| |**Delete**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.DeleteItem%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveCurrent%2A>| Adding a BindingNavigator control to a form and binding it to a data source, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>, will automatically establish the relationships in this table.
trans-unit.target: |UI 控制項 |BindingNavigator 成員 |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>成員 | |----------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |**先移動**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveFirstItem%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveFirst%2A>| |**移到上一個**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MovePreviousItem%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MovePrevious%2A>| |**目前位置**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A>| |**Count**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>| |**Move Next**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveNextItem%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveNext%2A>| |**Move Last**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveLastItem%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveLast%2A>| |**Add New**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddNewItem%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A>| |**Delete**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.DeleteItem%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveCurrent%2A>| BindingNavigator 控制項加入表單，並將它繫結至資料來源，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>，將會自動建立此資料表中的關聯性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveCurrent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.DeleteItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddNewItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveLast%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveLastItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveNext%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveNextItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MovePrevious%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MovePreviousItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveFirst%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveFirstItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: You can use one of the following techniques to customize this toolbar: - Create the BindingNavigator with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29> constructor, which accepts a Boolean `addStandardItems` parameter, and set this parameter to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用下列技術的其中一個來自訂此工具列:-建立具有 BindingNavigator<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29>建構函式，可接受布林值`addStandardItems`參數，並將此參數設定為`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29>

trans-unit.source: Then add the desired <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 然後將新增所需<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>物件加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>

trans-unit.source: - If a great deal of customization is desired, or the custom design will be reused, derive a class from BindingNavigator and override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> method to define additional or alternate standard items.
trans-unit.target: -如果想要大量自訂，或可重複使用自訂的設計，衍生類別覆寫與 BindingNavigator<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>方法，以定義其他或其他標準的項目。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The default constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> property to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 預設建構函式集<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>屬性`null`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: This constructor is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29> constructor with a parameter value of `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式相當於呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29>建構函式的參數值與`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29>

trans-unit.source: You can add the standard items by making a separate call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>個別呼叫加入標準項目

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"></xref> class, indicating whether to display the standard navigation user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"></xref>類別，表示是否要顯示的標準巡覽使用者介面 (UI)。

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> property to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>屬性`null`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> is `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddNewItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveFirstItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveLastItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveNextItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MovePreviousItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.DeleteItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A> will also be `null`.
trans-unit.target: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> is `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddNewItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveFirstItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveLastItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveNextItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MovePreviousItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.DeleteItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A> will also be `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.DeleteItem%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MovePreviousItem%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveNextItem%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveLastItem%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveFirstItem%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddNewItem%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to show the standard navigational UI; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>顯示標準的導覽 UI。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"></xref> class and adds this new instance to the specified container.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"></xref>類別，以及這個新的執行個體新增至指定的容器。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is provided as a convenience, combining the steps of creating a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control and adding it to a parent <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，結合的步驟，建立新的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>控制項，並將它加入至父代<xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer></xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>提供這個建構函式

trans-unit.source: Like the default constructor, it sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> property to `null` and does not show the standard user interface.
trans-unit.target: 預設建構函式，例如設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>屬性`null`並不會顯示標準使用者介面。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"></xref> to add the new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"></xref> control to.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"> </xref>要加入新<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"></xref>來控制。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref> as the data source.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"></xref>類別具有指定<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref>做為資料來源。

trans-unit.source: This constructor uses the `BindingSource` parameter to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會使用`BindingSource`參數來初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: It also adds the standard set of navigational buttons and sets their corresponding properties, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveNextItem%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 它也會將瀏覽按鈕的標準集，並設定其對應的屬性，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveNextItem%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveNextItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref> used as a data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref>當做資料來源使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> that represents the **Add New** button.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>表示**加入新** 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: When set, the AddNewItem property generates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event handler for the **Add New** button.
trans-unit.target: 設定時，會產生 AddNewItem 屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>事件處理常式**加入新** 按鈕。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>

trans-unit.source: This event handler calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A> method when the **Add New** button is clicked at run time.
trans-unit.target: 此事件處理常式會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A>方法時**加入新**按鈕在執行階段。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is `null` if it was not previously set and it is accessed before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> method is implicitly or explicitly called.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是`null`如果先前未設定，並存取之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>隱含或明確地呼叫方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control will disable the **Add New** button if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> property is `null` or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>控制項將會停用**加入新**按鈕如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>屬性是`null`或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew%2A>屬性是`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>

trans-unit.source: In the default implementation, this property represents a control of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.
trans-unit.target: 在預設實作中，這個屬性代表<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>類型的控制項

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> that represents the **Add New** button for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>表示**加入新**按鈕<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Adds the standard set of navigation items to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 將一組標準的瀏覽項目<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The AddStandardItems method adds the standard set of user interface <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> tool strip for basic navigation operations, such as **Move First**, **Move Last**, and **Add New**.
trans-unit.target: AddStandardItems 方法會將一組標準的使用者介面<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>物件加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>工具帶狀基本瀏覽作業，例如**移動第一個**，**最後移動**，和**加入新**。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>

trans-unit.source: Override AddStandardItems in derived classes to define additional or alternative tool strip items.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別，定義其他或替代工具帶狀項目中，覆寫 AddStandardItems。

trans-unit.source: To ensure optimal design-time support for your derived class, make sure each item has a meaningful value in its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要確保最佳的設計階段支援，為您衍生的類別，請確定每個項目中有意義的值及其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Name%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: At design time, this will be used to generate a unique name for the corresponding member variable.
trans-unit.target: 在設計階段，這會用來產生對應的成員變數的唯一名稱。

trans-unit.source: The item's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Name%2A> property will then be updated to match the name given to the member variable.
trans-unit.target: 項目的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Name%2A>屬性就會更新以符合提供給成員變數的名稱。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method does not explicitly remove any previously existing items from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>, but does set new values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveNextItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MovePreviousItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveFirstItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveLastItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddNewItem%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.DeleteItem%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 這個方法不會明確地移除任何先前已存在的項目從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>，但未設定的新值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveNextItem%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MovePreviousItem%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveFirstItem%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveLastItem%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddNewItem%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.DeleteItem%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.DeleteItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddNewItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveLastItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveFirstItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MovePreviousItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveNextItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>

trans-unit.source: Also AddStandardItems does not suspend layout while items are being added.
trans-unit.target: 也 AddStandardItems，不會暫停版面配置時新增項目。

trans-unit.source: Disables updates to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> controls of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"></xref> during the component's initialization.
trans-unit.target: 停用更新<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>控制項<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"></xref>元件的初始化期間。

trans-unit.source: The BeginInit and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.EndInit%2A> methods allow the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control to optimize changes to multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: BeginInit 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.EndInit%2A>方法，可讓<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>控制項來最佳化多個屬性的變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.EndInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using this pair of methods, you can initialize co-dependent properties or batch set multiple properties at design time.
trans-unit.target: 使用這一組方法，您可以初始化共同相依的屬性，或批次設定多個屬性在設計階段。

trans-unit.source: Call the BeginInit method to signal the control that initialization is starting; call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.EndInit%2A> method to signal that initialization is complete.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 BeginInit 方法來表示控制項正在啟動初始設定;呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.EndInit%2A>方法來通知初始設定已完成。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.EndInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref> component that is the source of data.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref>是資料來源的元件。

trans-unit.source: The BindingSource property represents the data source that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> navigates through.
trans-unit.target: BindingSource 屬性代表資料來源的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>巡覽。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>

trans-unit.source: More specifically, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> represents the actual data list.
trans-unit.target: 更具體來說，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>代表實際的資料清單。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is the default property for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> class.
trans-unit.target: 這是預設的屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref> component associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref>與此相關聯的元件<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> that displays the total number of items in the associated <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>會顯示在相關聯的項目總數<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The CountItem property is `null` if it was not previously set and it is accessed before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> method is implicitly or explicitly called.
trans-unit.target: CountItem 屬性是`null`如果先前未設定，並存取之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>隱含或明確地呼叫方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: The count of items is accessed through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.
trans-unit.target: 透過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>屬性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>存取的項目計數

trans-unit.source: In the default implementation, this property represents a control of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel>.
trans-unit.target: 在預設實作中，這個屬性代表<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel>類型的控制項

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> that displays the total number of items in the associated <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>會顯示在相關聯的項目總數<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string used to format the information displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem*> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定字串，用來格式化顯示的資訊<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem*>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A> control is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> that displays the total number of items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A>控制項是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel>顯示在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>的項目總數</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel></xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: The CountItemFormat property is the format string used to format the count.
trans-unit.target: CountItemFormat 屬性是用來格式化計數的格式字串。

trans-unit.source: For more information about format strings, see the <xref:System.String.Format%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需格式字串的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.String.Format%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.String.Format%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The format <xref:System.String> used to format the item count.
trans-unit.target: 格式<xref:System.String>用來格式化的項目計數。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default is the string "of {0}".
trans-unit.target: 預設值是"的 {0}"的字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> that is associated with the **Delete** functionality.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>相關聯**刪除**功能。

trans-unit.source: When set, this property generates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event handler for the **Delete** button.
trans-unit.target: 設定時，此屬性會產生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>事件處理常式**刪除** 按鈕。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>

trans-unit.source: This event handler calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveCurrent%2A> method when the **Delete** button is clicked at run time.
trans-unit.target: 此事件處理常式會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveCurrent%2A>方法時**刪除**按鈕在執行階段。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveCurrent%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is `null` if it was not previously set and it is accessed before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> method is implicitly or explicitly called.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是`null`如果先前未設定，並存取之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>隱含或明確地呼叫方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control will disable the **Delete** button under the following run-time circumstances: the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> property is `null`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> property is 0, or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowRemove%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>控制項將會停用**刪除**下列執行階段的情況下的按鈕︰<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>屬性是`null`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>屬性為 0，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowRemove%2A>屬性是`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowRemove%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>

trans-unit.source: In the default implementation, this property represents a control of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.
trans-unit.target: 在預設實作中，這個屬性代表<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>類型的控制項

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> that represents the **Delete** button for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>表示**刪除**按鈕<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的 unmanaged 的資源釋出<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"></xref>並選擇性釋放 managed 的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> references.
trans-unit.target: 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>參考。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用`Dispose()`每個參考物件的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Enables updates to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> controls of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"></xref> after the component's initialization has concluded.
trans-unit.target: 可讓更新<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>控制項<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"></xref>元件的初始化已結束之後。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BeginInit%2A> and EndInit methods allow the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control to optimize changes to multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BeginInit%2A>和 EndInit 方法，可讓<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>控制項來最佳化多個屬性的變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using this pair of methods, you can initialize co-dependent properties or batch set multiple properties at design time.
trans-unit.target: 使用這一組方法，您可以初始化共同相依的屬性，或批次設定多個屬性在設計階段。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BeginInit%2A> method to signal the control that initialization is starting; call the EndInit method to signal that initialization is complete.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BeginInit%2A>方法來通知控制項在啟動初始設定，則為呼叫 EndInit 方法來表示已完成初始設定。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is `null` if it was not previously set and it is accessed before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> method is implicitly or explicitly called.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是`null`如果先前未設定，並存取之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>隱含或明確地呼叫方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>控制項將會停用**移到上一個**下列執行階段的情況下的按鈕︰<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>屬性是`null`或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>屬性小於或等於 0。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>

trans-unit.source: In the default implementation, this property represents a control of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.
trans-unit.target: 在預設實作中，這個屬性代表<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>類型的控制項

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> that represents the **Move Previous** button for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>表示**移到上一個**按鈕<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.RefreshItems"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.RefreshItems"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: In addition to raising the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.RefreshItems> event, the OnRefreshItems method performs the following operations against the state of the associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.
trans-unit.target: 除了引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.RefreshItems>事件，OnRefreshItems 方法會執行下列作業的狀態相關聯的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>針對</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.RefreshItems>對應

trans-unit.source: - Sets the internal members using the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> state.
trans-unit.target: -設定使用目前的內部成員<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>狀態。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: - Enables or disables user interface (UI) items appropriately for the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> state.
trans-unit.target: -啟用或停用適用於目前的使用者介面 (UI) 項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>狀態。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: - Updates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A> controls.
trans-unit.target: -更新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The OnRefreshItems method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnRefreshItems 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是處理衍生類別中的事件的慣用的技巧。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> that displays the current position within the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>中目前的位置顯示<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: In the default implementation, the PositionItem property is of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 在預設實作中，PositionItem 屬性屬於型別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>

trans-unit.source: This property is `null` if it was not previously set and it is accessed before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> method is implicitly or explicitly called.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是`null`如果先前未設定，並存取之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>隱含或明確地呼叫方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: The current position calculated by obtaining the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>, and adding 1 to transform the position into a 1-based count.
trans-unit.target: 目前的位置計算方式是取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>，並加入要轉換成 1 為基底計數位置 1。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the default implementation, this property represents a control of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 在預設實作中，這個屬性代表<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>類型的控制項

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> that displays the current position.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> ，顯示目前的位置。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the state of the navigational user interface (UI) needs to be refreshed to reflect the current state of the underlying data.
trans-unit.target: 發生於巡覽使用者介面 (UI) 的狀態需要進行重新整理以反映基礎資料的目前狀態。

trans-unit.source: The RefreshItems event signals that the navigational UI of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> needs to be updated to reflect the current state of the associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.
trans-unit.target: RefreshItems 事件發出信號，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>必須更新以反映目前狀態的相關聯的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource></xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>的導覽 UI

trans-unit.source: This is the default event for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> class.
trans-unit.target: 這是預設事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the state of the standard items to reflect the current state of the data.
trans-unit.target: 重新整理以反映目前的狀態資料的標準項目的狀態。

trans-unit.source: If you have overridden <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> in a derived class, you should also override RefreshItemsCore to refresh any custom standard items you have added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果您已覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>在衍生類別中，您也應該覆寫重新整理您加入至任何自訂標準項目的 RefreshItemsCore<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Causes form validation to occur and returns whether validation was successful.
trans-unit.target: 導致發生表單驗證，並傳回驗證是否成功。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to confirm focus can shift before performing the click action for an item on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來確認焦點轉換在執行按一下動作的項目之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if validation was successful and focus can shift to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果驗證成功，焦點轉換至<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"> </xref>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
